title: Tuesday Sector Leaders: Technology & Communications, Materials
description: Looking at the sectors faring best as of midday Tuesday, shares of Technology & Communications companies are outperforming other sectors, higher by 1.7%.  Within that group, NXP Semiconductors NV (Symbol: NXPI) and ON Semiconductor Corp (Symbol: ON) are two large stocks leadi
content:
Looking at the sectors faring best as of midday Tuesday, shares of Technology & Communications companies are outperforming other sectors, higher by 1.7%. Within that group, NXP Semiconductors NV (Symbol: NXPI) and ON Semiconductor Corp (Symbol: ON) are two large stocks leading the way, showing a gain of 7.0% and 6.5%, respectively. Among technology ETFs, one ETF following the sector is the Technology Select Sector SPDR ETF (Symbol: XLK), which is up 1.4% on the day, and up 15.50% year-to-date. NXP Semiconductors NV, meanwhile, is up 6.55% year-to-date, and ON Semiconductor Corp, is down 20.44% year-to-date. Combined, NXPI and ON make up approximately 0.7% of the underlying holdings of XLK.

The next best performing sector is the Materials sector, up 1.5%. Among large Materials stocks, Builders FirstSource Inc. (Symbol: BLDR) and Eastman Chemical Co (Symbol: EMN) are the most notable, showing a gain of 6.2% and 3.9%, respectively. One ETF closely tracking Materials stocks is the Materials Select Sector SPDR ETF (XLB), which is up 1.2% in midday trading, and up 6.99% on a year-to-date basis. Builders FirstSource Inc., meanwhile, is down 4.34% year-to-date, and Eastman Chemical Co, is down 28.71% year-to-date. EMN makes up approximately 1.0% of the underlying holdings of XLB.

Comparing these stocks and ETFs on a trailing twelve month basis, below is a relative stock price performance chart, with each of the symbols shown in a different color as labeled in the legend at the bottom:

Here's a snapshot of how the S&P 500 components within the various sectors are faring in afternoon trading on Tuesday. As you can see, nine sectors are up on the day, while none of the sectors are down.

10 ETFs With Stocks That Insiders Are Buying »
summary: Shares in Technology & Communications companies are outperforming other sectors by 1.7%, with NXP Semiconductors NV (NXPI) and ON Semiconductor Corp (ISP) leading the way with a gain of 7.0% and 6.5%, respectively. The Technology Select Sector SPDR ETF (XLK) is up 1.4% on the day and up 15.50% year-to-date. The Materials sector, up 1.,5%, is the second best performing sector. The XLP ETF also closely follows the Materials sector.
shortSummary: The Technology & Communications sector leads the charge as well as Materials, with NXP Semiconductors NV and ON Semiconductor Corp leading the charge, outperforming other sectors.

| About Ultralife Corp |
| Ultralife Corporation offers products and services ranging from power solutions to communications and electronics systems to customers across the globe in the government, defense and commercial sectors. Co.'s segments include Battery & Energy Products and Communications Systems. The Battery & Energy Products segment includes Lithium 9-volt, cylindrical, thin cell and other non-rechargeable batteries, in addition to rechargeable batteries, uninterruptable power supplies, charging systems and accessories. We show 65 historical shares outstanding datapoints in our ULBI shares outstanding history coverage, used to compute ULBI market cap on those dates. Understanding the changing numbers of shares outstanding, the changing share price, and the resulting changing ULBI market cap history over the course of time is important for investors interested in comparing ULBI's market cap history versus its peers. Many "beginner" or "novice" investors will look at one stock trading at a price of $10 per share and another trading at a price of $20 per share and think the latter company is worth twice as much. Of course, that is a completely meaningless comparison without also knowing how many shares outstanding there are for each of the two companies, and then calculating their respective market caps. Comparing the share price of ULBI versus a peer is one thing; comparing ULBI market cap versus a peer is a completely different story. Furthermore, via fluctuation both in per-share price and in the number of shares outstanding (via issuance of new shares over time, the repurchase of existing shares), the market cap for a company like ULBI can fluctuate over the course of history. With this page we aim to empower investors researching ULBI by allowing them to research the ULBI market cap history. |

For ETFs, an interesting consideration with analyst target prices is that reaching the target price makes no difference to the
ETF as far as deciding whether to continue to hold the stock. ETFs by nature are passive index-followers, so as long as the
stock remains in the index, it doesn't much matter whether analysts find the stock overvalued or undervalued. Below are some

argos_summary: As of midday Tuesday, the Technology & Communications sector is leading the market with a 1.7% increase, driven by NXP Semiconductors NV and ON Semiconductor Corp, which gained 7.0% and 6.5%, respectively. The Materials sector follows closely with a 1.5% rise, highlighted by Builders FirstSource Inc. and Eastman Chemical Co., which saw gains of 6.2% and 3.9%. Overall, nine sectors are up for the day, indicating a positive trend in the market.
